titleStmt.title: Vocabularium parvum Anglo-Latinum, in usum puerulorum, qui prima Latinæ linguæ tyrocinia faciunt. = A little vocabulary English and Latine, for the use of little children, that begin to learn the Latine tongue. By Ch: Hoole Mr. of Arts, and teacher of a private grammar school in Goldsmiths-Alley, London
titleStmt.author: Hoole, Charles, 1610-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joshua Kirton, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Kings Arms in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Kings Arms in Pauls Church-yard
